description: Temporary permission for use of premises as a hand car wash.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  This approval is subject to the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority of a written code for the management of noise from the premises and the areas of the site external to the building, which is the subject of this consent.  The areas covered are delineated in the attached plan (Texaco Service Station, 287-297 New North Road, London, N1 8SS EKA.Pro91054.AppP052844.Plan01) shown hatched.  The code shall be submitted to and approved in writing within one month of the date of this decision notice.  The code shall be fully implemented within one month of the date of this decision notice and operated at all times in accordance with the approved details.  The code shall identify measures to reduce the impact of light and noise.

REASON:  To protect the amenities of neighbouring residential properties.
